archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Risk Management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.3.4.1] The purpose of the Risk Management process is to identify, analyze, treat and monitor the risks continually.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 114

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.3.4.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Risikomanagement" ist das Erkennen, Analysieren, Behandeln und Beobachten von Risiken".
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.3.4.1] The purpose of the Risk Management process is to identify, analyze, treat and monitor the risks continually.
